name: Spicy Baked Potato Casserole
author: Spiderwoman77
summary: I love the idea of stuffed baked potatoes but can't be bothered with the long cooking time or making things look nice and neat. This is my lazy man's version of stuffed baked potatoes... with added zip!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Prick potatoes several times with a fork and place into a microwave-safe dish
Place potatoes on a flat work surface
Slice each potato in half; scoop out the flesh into a bowl, leaving only the skins
Flatten the skins into a single layer in an 8-inch baking pan
Mix in eggs, Cheddar cheese, butter, green onion, garlic, turmeric, paprika, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper
Layer the mixture over the potato skins
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and lightly browned on top, about 20 minutes
